Tissue-Gene pairs, direct causal Variants, and Infinitesimal effects selector ================

Installation:

Run the following in R:

install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("harryyiheyang/TGVIS")

Tutorials:

Please visit the online documentation: https://harryyiheyang.github.io/TGVIS/
